Internet Freedom Festival 2019 Program

Countering Troll Armies

Date: Wednesday, April 3, 2019
Time: 09:45 - 10:45 AM
Room: Theater
Notes: pad.internetfreedomfestival.org/p/1356
Duration: 1 hour(s)
Format: Collaborative Talk
Theme: Hacking the Net
Presenter: Quyen
Other Presenters: Elodie Vialle
Description:
Vietnam’s cyber army has become more creative with its attacks. From abusing the Facebook report button to more sophisticated phishing attacks, the cyber army is determined to stop any form of free expression on Facebook. Learn more about these attacks so we can come up with ways to counter them.
Target Audience:
Advocacy/policy professionals, organisations under online harassment, journalists, security trainers, communications professionals, front line activists
Goal of the session:
Learn about the new tactics troll armies are implementing to take down activist accounts and formulate methods to counter these tactics.
Desired Outcome:
To share best practices and forms of support we can provide to Vietnamese activists and netizens who are victims of cyberbullying. To create a list of methods to tackle these various issues from the discussion
